works.title: Development of new 3D human ex vivo models to study sebaceous gland lipid metabolism and modulations
abstract:
Objectives
Sebaceous glands maintain skin homeostasis by producing sebum. Low production can induce hair loss and fragile skin. Overproduction provokes seborrhoea and may lead to acne and inflammatory events. To better study sebaceous gland maintenance, sebocyte maturation, lipid production and ageing or inflammatory processes, we developed innovat...

abstract:
Background: 
Protein glycation refers to the spontaneous reaction of reducing sugars with proteins and the subsequent formation of stable advanced glycation end products (AGEs). abstract: Basement membrane (BM) are important regulators of cell behaviours and not just structural features of tissues. Indeed, skin BM mediates tissue compartmentalization but also sends signals to epithelial cells from external microenvironment.
